parameters.name: Group ID
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the group for which status was requested.

parameters.name: Group Name
parameters.description: A reference name (string) for the group. Optional.

parameters.name: Watts Total
parameters.description: Present AC active power imported or exported from the DER group (signed quantity).

parameters.name: VA
parameters.description: Present apparent power imported or exported from the DER group.

parameters.name: VAR Total
parameters.description: Present reactive power (capacitive or inductive) produced by the DER group.

parameters.name: Hz
parameters.description: Average line frequency of the DER group.

parameters.name: Present Energy Stored
parameters.description: Present stored energy by the DER group.
